data.eml:eml: A redescription of the monotypic felt scale insect genus Pedroniopsis Green (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Eriococcidae) from India and Burma

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hodgson, Chris J., Williams, Douglas J. (2016): A redescription of the monotypic felt scale insect genus Pedroniopsis Green (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Eriococcidae) from India and Burma. Zootaxa 4137 (1): 146-150, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.1.12
